name: Escape KSSSR Antory
description:
This is a VR experience in which you are onboard КСССР Анторы Цартова (KSSSR Antory Tsartov).

Explore a zero-g environment pulling yourself around with the help of the interior, as you solve puzzles in order to complete missions given by the ship's AI. 

Credits Programmers and Designers:

Linus Jonsson
Simon Jonasson
Adam Forsell

Graphic Artists:

Simon Jonasson
Linda Davidsson
Julia Ahlberg
Simon Bengtsson
Isabelle Eriksson Koski
Theresa Andersson
Tawan Hjulgren
